channel.title: How to remove, add, change PK areas
channel.description: Hey, i'm trying to make a pk server, but i have no idea on how to add, remove and change pk areas. I'm using deltascape, and i just want the pvp, not the drops. Just as when you kill someone, they drop an custom item called "PvP Mark" or something. Some help, or a tut plz?

item.title: How to remove, add, change PK areas
item.dc:creator: @str_o_tek str o tek
item.description:
@str_o_tek wrote:

Hey, i’m trying to make a pk server, but i have no idea on how to add, remove and change pk areas.
I’m using deltascape, and i just want the pvp, not the drops. Just as when you kill someone, they drop an custom item called “PvP Mark” or something.
Some help, or a tut plz?

Read full topic
item.source: How to remove, add, change PK areas
